abstract: The window of opportunity for Microsoft to come out with a Windows tablet that successfully challenges the iPad is closing, according to a report from Forrester Research to be published Tuesday. A recent survey by the firm shows that consumer interest in a tablet computer running Windows has dimmed measurably since the beginning of the year.
